title: Successful registration redirects to onboarding
description: Verifies a new user can register with valid details and is redirected into the onboarding wizard.

steps.description: Type "Test Salon LLC" into the business name input field
Type "newuser+reg1@example.com" into the email input field
Type "ValidPass!234" into the password input field

title: Registration with already-registered email shows error
description: Verifies the system blocks registration when the email is already in use and displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Type "Test Barber Shop" into the business name input field
Type "existing.user@example.com" into the email input field
Type "ValidPass!234" into the password input field

title: Required field validation blocks submit when business name is missing
description: Verifies registration cannot proceed and shows a validation message when business name is not provided.

steps.description: Type "newuser+reg2@example.com" into the email input field
Type "ValidPass!234" into the password input field

title: Required field validation blocks submit when email is missing
description: Verifies registration cannot proceed and shows a validation message when email is not provided.

steps.description: Type "Test Salon LLC" into the business name input field
Type "ValidPass!234" into the password input field

title: Invalid email format shows validation error
description: Verifies the registration form rejects an incorrectly formatted email and displays a visible error.

steps.description: Type "Test Salon LLC" into the business name input field
Type "not-an-email" into the email input field
Type "ValidPass!234" into the password input field

title: Weak password shows validation error and stays on register page
description: Verifies a too-short or weak password prevents registration and shows a visible message.

steps.description: Type "Test Salon LLC" into the business name input field
Type "newuser+reg3@example.com" into the email input field
Type "123" into the password input field

title: Register page allows navigation to login page
description: Verifies a user can move from the registration page to the login page using the visible link.

title: Submitting registration via Enter key triggers form submission
description: Verifies pressing Enter in the password field attempts to submit the registration form.

steps.description: Type "Test Salon LLC" into the business name input field
Type "newuser+reg4@example.com" into the email input field
Type "ValidPass!234" into the password input field

title: Request password reset with a registered email shows confirmation message
description: Verifies a user can submit the forgot password form and sees a confirmation to check email.

steps.description: Verify text "check your email" is visible

title: Request password reset with an unregistered email shows 'email not found' error
description: Verifies submitting an unknown email displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Verify text "email not found" is visible

title: Forgot password form blocks submission when email is empty
description: Verifies the user cannot submit the forgot password form without providing an email.

title: Forgot password form validates invalid email format
description: Verifies the user sees a validation error when entering a malformed email address.

title: User can navigate from Forgot Password back to Login
description: Verifies the page provides a way to return to the login screen.

title: Forgot password submission via Enter key triggers request
description: Verifies pressing Enter from the email field submits the form and shows confirmation messaging.

steps.description: Verify text "check your email" is visible

title: Duplicate reset requests show a stable confirmation state
description: Verifies submitting the forgot password form twice does not break the UI and continues to show confirmation messaging.

steps.description: Verify text "check your email" is visible
Verify text "check your email" is visible

title: Successful password update redirects user to Login
description: Verifies a user can set a new password and is redirected to the login page with a visible confirmation.

steps.description: Type "NewPass!2345" into the new password field
Type "NewPass!2345" into the confirm password field

title: Mismatched passwords show validation error
description: Verifies the form blocks submission when the confirmation password does not match and shows the correct error message.

steps.description: Type "NewPass!2345" into the new password field
Type "Different!2345" into the confirm password field
Verify text "passwords do not match" is visible

title: Empty submission shows required field validation
description: Verifies the user cannot submit the update form with empty fields and sees required field errors.

steps.description: Verify text "New password is required" is visible
Verify text "Confirm password is required" is visible

title: Password complexity/length validation prevents weak password
description: Verifies the UI shows a validation message when the new password does not meet minimum requirements.

steps.description: Type "123" into the new password field
Type "123" into the confirm password field

title: Trimming/whitespace handling: passwords with trailing spaces should not silently succeed
description: Verifies the UI does not allow accidental whitespace discrepancies to pass without an explicit match/validation result.

steps.description: Type "NewPass!2345 " into the new password field
Type "NewPass!2345" into the confirm password field
Verify text "passwords do not match" is visible

title: Login link is available from Update Password page
description: Verifies users can navigate to the login page from the update password screen via a visible link.

title: Join an open queue successfully and land on queue status page
description: Verifies a public visitor can join an open queue and is redirected to a queue status page showing their position.

steps.description: Navigate to the public queue join URL for a known professional (a /queue/... page).
Type "Test Customer" into the name input field.
Type "11999990000" into the phone input field.

title: Queue join requires name (validation prevents confirmation)
description: Verifies the join flow blocks submission when the name field is empty.

steps.description: Navigate to the public queue join URL for a known professional (a /queue/... page).
Type "11999990001" into the phone input field.

title: Queue join requires phone (validation prevents confirmation)
description: Verifies the join flow blocks submission when the phone field is empty.

steps.description: Navigate to the public queue join URL for a known professional (a /queue/... page).
Type "Test Customer" into the name input field.

title: Cancel/close the join modal and remain on the join page
description: Verifies a visitor can exit the join dialog without joining and stays on the queue join page.

steps.description: Navigate to the public queue join URL for a known professional (a /queue/... page).
Verify text "Confirm Join" is not visible.

title: Attempt to join when queue is closed or full shows error message
description: Verifies the application shows an explicit error when attempting to join a closed/full queue.

steps.description: Navigate to the public queue join URL for a known professional whose queue is closed or full (a /queue/... page).
Type "Test Customer" into the name input field.
Type "11999990002" into the phone input field.
Verify text "queue closed or full" is visible.

title: After a closed/full error, user can retry and error remains consistent
description: Verifies the error state is stable and does not redirect to queue status when the queue remains closed/full.

steps.description: Navigate to the public queue join URL for a known professional whose queue is closed or full (a /queue/... page).
Type "Retry Customer" into the name input field.
Type "11999990003" into the phone input field.
Verify text "queue closed or full" is visible.

title: Successful join shows queue status content after redirect
description: Verifies the queue status page displays key status information after a successful join.

steps.description: Navigate to the public queue join URL for a known professional (a /queue/... page).
Type "Status Check" into the name input field.
Type "11999990004" into the phone input field.

title: Valid queue status page shows position and estimated wait
description: Verifies that a queue status page displays the clientâ€™s current position and an estimated wait time.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid public queue status link (a /queue-status/ URL with a real queue id provided by the test environment).

title: Valid queue status page shows a clear current status label
description: Verifies that the queue status page presents a clear status indicator (e.g., waiting/serving) in addition to numeric details.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid public queue status link (a /queue-status/ URL with a real queue id provided by the test environment).
Verify text "Now serving" is visible or Verify text "Waiting" is visible.

title: Real-time updates refresh visible queue position when it changes
description: Verifies the page receives real-time updates by observing a change in the visible position/status within a reasonable time window.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid public queue status link (a /queue-status/ URL with a real queue id that is actively moving in the test environment).
Verify the displayed queue position value has changed or Verify text "Now serving" is visible.
Verify the displayed queue position value has changed again or Verify text "Now serving" is visible.

title: When at the front, page shows 'Now serving' state
description: Verifies that when the client reaches the front of the queue, the page shows a clear 'Now serving' status.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid public queue status link (a /queue-status/ URL with a real queue id that is expected to be at the front in the test environment).
Verify text "1" is visible or Verify text "0" is visible.

title: Invalid queue link shows 'queue not found' error message
description: Verifies that an invalid queue status URL shows a clear error message and does not show queue details.

steps.description: Verify text "queue not found" is visible.

title: Malformed queue id shows invalid link messaging
description: Verifies that a clearly malformed queue id results in an invalid link/queue not found message.

steps.description: Verify text "queue not found" is visible or Verify text "invalid" is visible.

title: Queue status page remains readable after waiting (no blank/loader lock)
description: Verifies the page does not get stuck in a loading state during normal viewing and continues to show queue details.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid public queue status link (a /queue-status/ URL with a real queue id provided by the test environment).

title: View professional portfolio details (services and availability)
description: Verifies a public professional portfolio page loads and shows services and availability information.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid professional portfolio URL (a working /pro/ slug provided by the test environment).

title: Book a service from the professional portfolio
description: Verifies clicking Book from a service on the portfolio takes the user to the public booking page for that professional.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid professional portfolio URL (a working /pro/ slug provided by the test environment).
Click on "Book" for the first visible service.

title: Portfolio shows service pricing information
description: Verifies that services displayed on the portfolio include visible pricing information.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid professional portfolio URL (a working /pro/ slug provided by the test environment).

title: Portfolio provides a visible booking call-to-action
description: Verifies the portfolio page provides an obvious call-to-action to book a service.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid professional portfolio URL (a working /pro/ slug provided by the test environment).
Scroll to the bottom of the page.

title: Non-existent professional profile shows 'profile not found' error
description: Verifies an invalid professional slug results in a visible 'profile not found' error message.

steps.description: Navigate to a professional portfolio URL using an invalid slug (for example: /pro/this-slug-should-not-exist-123).
Verify text "profile not found" is visible.
Verify element "Professional Portfolio" is not visible.

title: Booking action is not available when no services are listed
description: Verifies that if the professional has no services displayed, the page communicates it and does not show a service-level Book action.

steps.description: Navigate to a professional portfolio URL for a professional configured with zero services (a working /pro/ slug provided by the test environment).

title: Availability section is present and readable
description: Verifies the availability section renders and is readable on the portfolio page.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid professional portfolio URL (a working /pro/ slug provided by the test environment).

title: Complete onboarding wizard with required business details and finish setup
description: Verifies an authenticated admin can complete the onboarding wizard and is redirected to the dashboard.

steps.description: Click on "Onboarding" or "Get started" from the dashboard navigation
Type "Beauty OS Test Salon" into the business name field

title: Configure opening hours during onboarding and complete setup
description: Verifies opening hours can be configured in the onboarding wizard and completing setup redirects to the dashboard.

steps.description: Click on "Onboarding" or "Get started" from the dashboard navigation
Click the "Opening hours" or "Hours" step in the wizard

title: Validation error when required business name is missing
description: Verifies the onboarding wizard blocks progress and shows a validation message when a required field is empty.

steps.description: Click on "Onboarding" or "Get started" from the dashboard navigation

title: Validation error when opening hours are incomplete
description: Verifies the onboarding wizard shows an error when opening hours are left incomplete and the user attempts to complete setup.

steps.description: Click on "Onboarding" or "Get started" from the dashboard navigation
Click the "Opening hours" or "Hours" step in the wizard

title: Cancel/exit onboarding returns user to dashboard without completing
description: Verifies the user can exit the onboarding wizard (if option exists) and return to the dashboard.

steps.description: Click on "Onboarding" or "Get started" from the dashboard navigation

title: Onboarding wizard displays key sections for business setup
description: Verifies the onboarding wizard loads and shows the expected sections for business details and hours configuration.

steps.description: Click on "Onboarding" or "Get started" from the dashboard navigation

title: Dashboard loads for authenticated user and shows core KPI and upcoming appointments sections
description: Verifies that an authenticated admin can access the dashboard and see KPI cards and upcoming appointments content.

title: View Agenda daily schedule after login
description: Verifies a staff user can log in and see the daily schedule on the Agenda page.

steps.description: Click "Agenda" in the main navigation menu

title: Open an appointment from daily schedule
description: Verifies a staff user can open appointment details from the daily schedule in Agenda.

steps.description: Click "Agenda" in the main navigation menu
Click on an appointment item in the schedule list/grid

title: Mark an appointment as completed from appointment details
description: Verifies a staff user can mark an appointment as completed and see the status updated.

steps.description: Click "Agenda" in the main navigation menu
Click on an appointment item in the schedule list/grid

title: Mark as completed action is not offered for an already completed appointment
description: Verifies the UI prevents completing an appointment that is already completed.

steps.description: Click "Agenda" in the main navigation menu
Click on an appointment item that is labeled "Completed" in the schedule (if present)
Verify text "Mark as Completed" is not visible

title: Attempt to edit an appointment without permission shows permission denied
description: Verifies an edit attempt outside allowed permissions shows a permission denied error message.

steps.description: Click "Agenda" in the main navigation menu
Click on an appointment item in the schedule list/grid

title: Permission denied is dismissible and user stays on appointment details
description: Verifies that after a permission denied message, the user can dismiss it and remains on the appointment details view.

steps.description: Click "Agenda" in the main navigation menu
Click on an appointment item in the schedule list/grid
Click the "Close" or "OK" button on the permission denied message

title: Weekly view toggle shows a week schedule layout
description: Verifies the Agenda can switch from daily to weekly view and display a weekly schedule.

steps.description: Click "Agenda" in the main navigation menu

title: Move a queued client to In Service
description: Verifies an authenticated user can move a selected client from the queue into the 'In Service' status and see the UI update.

steps.description: Click on "Fila" (Queue) in the main navigation

title: View current queue list on Fila page
description: Verifies the queue management page loads and shows a visible queue list section for monitoring clients.

steps.description: Click on "Fila" (Queue) in the main navigation

title: Select a client in the queue to view available actions
description: Verifies a user can select a client entry in the queue and see action controls (e.g., move status) appear.

steps.description: Click on "Fila" (Queue) in the main navigation
Click on the first client in the queue list
Verify element "Move to In Service" is visible

title: Move selected client to In Service and confirm status label changes
description: Verifies moving a client to 'In Service' updates the status label in the queue UI.

steps.description: Click on "Fila" (Queue) in the main navigation
Click on the first client in the queue list
Click the "Move to In Service" button

title: Monitor in-service section after moving a client
description: Verifies that after moving a client to 'In Service', the in-service clients section is visible and reflects the change.

steps.description: Click on "Fila" (Queue) in the main navigation
Click on the first client in the queue list
Click the "Move to In Service" button
Verify element "In Service" section is visible

title: Attempt queue action without adequate permissions shows permission denied error
description: Verifies a user without required permissions is blocked from performing a queue action and sees a permission denied message.

steps.description: Click on "Fila" (Queue) in the main navigation
Click on the first client in the queue list
Click the "Move to In Service" button

title: Permission denied error is visible and user remains on Fila page
description: Verifies that after a permission denial, the user stays on the queue management page and the error remains visible.

steps.description: Click on "Fila" (Queue) in the main navigation
Click on the first client in the queue list
Click the "Move to In Service" button

title: Queue page handles empty state gracefully
description: Verifies the queue management page shows a clear empty-state message when there are no clients waiting.

steps.description: Click on "Fila" (Queue) in the main navigation
Verify text "No clients in queue" is visible

title: View clients list after login
description: Verifies an authenticated user can open the Clients page and see the clients list UI.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button
Click on "Clientes" in the main navigation menu

title: Search clients from the clients list
description: Verifies searching on the Clients page filters results based on the typed query.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button
Click on "Clientes" in the main navigation menu
Verify element "Client list results" is visible

title: Open a client CRM details page from the list
description: Verifies clicking a client entry navigates to that clientâ€™s CRM details page.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button
Click on "Clientes" in the main navigation menu
Click on the first client entry in the list

title: Empty state is shown when there are no clients
description: Verifies the Clients page shows an empty state message and an add/import CTA when no clients exist.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button
Click on "Clientes" in the main navigation menu
Verify element "Add client" or "Import" call-to-action is visible

title: Empty state CTA is visible and actionable
description: Verifies the empty state provides a visible call-to-action to add or import clients.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button
Click on "Clientes" in the main navigation menu
Click the "Add client" call-to-action if visible (otherwise click "Import" call-to-action)
Verify element "Add client" or "Import clients" page/section is visible

title: Search with no matches shows a clear 'no results' state
description: Verifies searching for a non-matching term shows a no-results message/state instead of stale results.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button
Click on "Clientes" in the main navigation menu

title: Clear search restores the full clients list view
description: Verifies clearing the search field restores the default clients list state.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button
Click on "Clientes" in the main navigation menu

title: Add a new CRM note from Client Details and see it in the timeline
description: Verifies an authenticated user can add a note on the Client CRM page and the note becomes visible in the visit/timeline area.

steps.description: Click the first client in the clients list

title: Client Details shows contact info and timeline sections
description: Verifies core client information and the visit/timeline area are visible on the Client CRM page for a valid client.

steps.description: Click the first client in the clients list

title: Add Note dialog opens from Client Details
description: Verifies the Add Note entry point is present and opens a note input UI on the Client CRM page.

steps.description: Click the first client in the clients list
Verify element "Note" / "Nota" input field is visible

title: Saving an empty note is blocked (validation)
description: Verifies the system prevents saving a blank CRM note and shows a visible validation message or keeps Save disabled.

steps.description: Click the first client in the clients list

title: Canceling Add Note does not add a new entry to the timeline
description: Verifies cancel/close of the Add Note flow does not create a timeline entry.

steps.description: Click the first client in the clients list

title: Invalid client id shows 'client not found' error
description: Verifies the Client CRM page displays a clear 'client not found' message when the client does not exist.

steps.description: Verify text "client not found" is visible

title: View Finance overview with cash flow summary and revenue charts
description: Verifies an authenticated user can open the Finance page and see key financial overview components.

steps.description: Click "Financeiro" in the main navigation menu

title: Finance page shows cash flow summary section
description: Verifies the Finance page displays a visible cash flow summary area for the current view.

steps.description: Click "Financeiro" in the main navigation menu
Verify text "Fluxo de caixa" is visible
Verify element "cash flow summary" is visible

title: Finance page shows revenue by professional chart
description: Verifies the Finance page displays a revenue chart broken down by professional.

steps.description: Click "Financeiro" in the main navigation menu
Verify text "Receita por profissional" is visible

title: Access Insights page and view KPI cards/charts
description: Verifies an authenticated admin can open Reports/Insights and see KPI cards and at least one chart area rendered.

steps.description: Click on "Insights" in the main navigation menu

title: KPI cards are visible for key metrics
description: Verifies the main KPIs (e.g., faturamento, ticket mÃ©dio, ocupaÃ§Ã£o) are visible as cards on the Insights page.

steps.description: Click on "Insights" in the main navigation menu

title: Apply date filter and see visible range indication
description: Verifies a user can apply a date filter and see the selected range reflected on the page.

steps.description: Click on "Insights" in the main navigation menu
Click on the date range filter control
Select the "Last 30 days" option from the date range dropdown

title: Date filter updates charts content (visual refresh)
description: Verifies applying a date range triggers a visible chart refresh (e.g., loading state or updated labels) without leaving the page.

steps.description: Click on "Insights" in the main navigation menu
Click on the date range filter control
Select the "This month" option from the date range dropdown

title: Very large date range shows loading then timeout error message
description: Verifies selecting a very large date range shows a loading indicator and, if a timeout occurs, displays a 'data load failed' error message.

steps.description: Click on "Insights" in the main navigation menu
Click on the date range filter control
Select the "All time" option from the date range dropdown
Verify text "data load failed" is visible

title: Insights page remains usable after data load failure
description: Verifies that after a data load failure, the user can still interact with the date filter to choose a smaller range.

steps.description: Click on "Insights" in the main navigation menu
Click on the date range filter control
Select the "All time" option from the date range dropdown
Verify text "data load failed" is visible
Click on the date range filter control
Select the "Last 7 days" option from the date range dropdown

title: Insights navigation is stable and does not redirect away after filtering
description: Verifies the user stays on /insights after applying a filter and the page does not unexpectedly navigate away.

steps.description: Click on "Insights" in the main navigation menu
Click on the date range filter control
Select the "Today" option from the date range dropdown
